headline: Trump backs GOP’s JD Vance in U.S. Senate primary in Ohio
author: Associated Press
sentences:
By JILL COLVIN and JULIE CARR SMYTH
COLUMBUS — Former President Donald Trump is endorsing “Hillbilly Elegy” author JD Vance in Ohio’s competitive Republican Senate primary, ending months of jockeying in a race where his backing could be pivotal.

In a statement, Trump described Vance as “the candidate most qualified and ready to win in November.”
“We cannot play games.
